|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device appears to be another OEM Cameo AP81 product. It looks very similar to the [[TRENDnet TEW-632BRP]]. The default SSID is probably '''planexuser'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.planex.net/pdf/router/MZK-W300NH_Manual_v1.0_Eng.pdf Manual]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/planex/mzk-w300nh On the OpenWrt wiki]
